strings.Value: "I still want to be with you."
{n}As you approach the exit, Tristian appears from the shadows. The whitish hair framing his face looks like a shroud, but the deva's face radiates calm.{/n} "Your Highness."
{n}Tristian laughs softly.{/n} "If accuracy is a kingly virtue, you are ready for the title."
"Just a minute of your time. It's all I'm asking."

"You are on the verge of a great fate, {name}. I am happy that I have been a part of it... even if my role in your advancement was so two-faced. Together we've been through so much... and I realize that without you I would be dead. Or, what's worse, continue to serve Nyrissa who tied me down with her lies. I'm sorry I had to deceive you for such a long time, but there were things I was sincere about."

"I know I don't have the right to ask you for anything. I know I should be grateful to you for just letting me stay near. But I will never forgive myself if I don't ask..." {n}Tristan makes a step towards you, his voice is barely audible.{/n} "Now that hypocrisy and lies are in the past, you gave me another chance. Will you give another chance... to us?"
{n}Tristian lowers his head.{/n} "Of course. Well... Thank you for your honesty."

{n}Tristian makes another step and is so close that his ragged breathing tickles the skin of your cheek.{/n} "I promise... no, I swear to you. If you wish, I'll give my life for you. No more duplicity. No more deception. Just the truth. Just..." {n}Tristian holds your hand to his mouth and kisses it tenderly.{/n}
"Go on, your subjects are waiting. So does your fate. May {g|Sarenrae}Sarenrae{/g} bless you!"
